headline.main: BIG RUSSIAN FORCE REPORTD IN SOUTH; 31 Divisions Massed in Areas Taken Over From Rumania, Travelers Declare AIRPORTS BUILT AT BORDER Germans Setting Up Defenses at Constanta and Delivering Additional Equipment

lead_paragraph: BUCHAREST, Rumania, Nov. 2 (AP)--Soviet Russia has concentrated thirty-one divisions of troops and three brigades of mechanized equipment in Bessarabia and Northern Bukovina, travelers said today upon their arrival here from the provinces that Russia acquired from Rumania last Summer.
